apis.name: Epic Links API
apis.description: Multi-level Epics are available only in GitLab Ultimate. If the Multi-level Epics feature is not available, a 403 status code is returned.

apis.name: List epics related to a given epic
apis.description: Gets all child epics of an epic.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the group owned by the authenticated user

attributes.name: epic_iid
attributes.description: The internal ID of the epic.

apis.response: [  {    "id": 29,    "iid": 6,    "group_id": 1,    "parent_id": 5,    "title": "Accusamus iste et ullam ratione voluptatem omnis debitis dolor est.",    "description": "Molestias dolorem eos vitae expedita impedit necessitatibus quo voluptatum.",    "author": {      "id": 10,      "name": "Lu Mayer",      "username": "kam",      "state": "active",      "avatar_url": "http://www.gravatar.com/avatar/018729e129a6f31c80a6327a30196823?s=80&d=identicon",      "web_url": "http://localhost:3001/kam"    },    "start_date": null,    "start_date_is_fixed": false,    "start_date_fixed": null,    "start_date_from_milestones": null,       //deprecated in favor of start_date_from_inherited_source    "start_date_from_inherited_source": null,    "end_date": "2018-07-31",                 //deprecated in favor of due_date    "due_date": "2018-07-31",    "due_date_is_fixed": false,    "due_date_fixed": null,    "due_date_from_milestones": "2018-07-31", //deprecated in favor of start_date_from_inherited_source    "due_date_from_inherited_source": "2018-07-31",    "created_at": "2018-07-17T13:36:22.770Z",    "updated_at": "2018-07-18T12:22:05.239Z",    "labels": []  }]

apis.name: Assign a child epic
apis.description: Creates an association between two epics, designating one as the parent epic and the other as the child epic. A parent epic can have multiple child epics. If the new child epic already belonged to another epic, it is unassigned from that previous parent.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the group owned by the authenticated user

attributes.name: epic_iid
attributes.description: The internal ID of the epic.

attributes.name: child_epic_id
attributes.description: The global ID of the child epic. Internal ID can’t be used because they can conflict with epics from other groups.

apis.response: {  "id": 6,  "iid": 38,  "group_id": 1,  "parent_id": 5,  "title": "Accusamus iste et ullam ratione voluptatem omnis debitis dolor est.",  "description": "Molestias dolorem eos vitae expedita impedit necessitatibus quo voluptatum.",  "author": {    "id": 10,    "name": "Lu Mayer",    "username": "kam",    "state": "active",    "avatar_url": "http://www.gravatar.com/avatar/018729e129a6f31c80a6327a30196823?s=80&d=identicon",    "web_url": "http://localhost:3001/kam"  },  "start_date": null,  "start_date_is_fixed": false,  "start_date_fixed": null,  "start_date_from_milestones": null,       //deprecated in favor of start_date_from_inherited_source  "start_date_from_inherited_source": null,  "end_date": "2018-07-31",                 //deprecated in favor of due_date  "due_date": "2018-07-31",  "due_date_is_fixed": false,  "due_date_fixed": null,  "due_date_from_milestones": "2018-07-31", //deprecated in favor of start_date_from_inherited_source  "due_date_from_inherited_source": "2018-07-31",  "created_at": "2018-07-17T13:36:22.770Z",  "updated_at": "2018-07-18T12:22:05.239Z",  "labels": []}

apis.name: Create and assign a child epic
apis.description: Creates a new epic and associates it with provided parent epic. The response is LinkedEpic object.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the group owned by the authenticated user

attributes.name: epic_iid
attributes.description: The internal ID of the (future parent) epic.

attributes.name: title
attributes.description: The title of a newly created epic.

attributes.name: confidential
attributes.description: Whether the epic should be confidential. Parameter is ignored if confidential_epics feature flag is disabled. Defaults to the confidentiality state of the parent epic.

apis.name: Re-order a child epic

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the group owned by the authenticated user.

attributes.name: epic_iid
attributes.description: The internal ID of the epic.

attributes.name: child_epic_id
attributes.description: The global ID of the child epic. Internal ID can’t be used because they can conflict with epics from other groups.

attributes.name: move_before_id
attributes.description: The global ID of a sibling epic that should be placed before the child epic.

attributes.name: move_after_id
attributes.description: The global ID of a sibling epic that should be placed after the child epic.

apis.response: [  {    "id": 29,    "iid": 6,    "group_id": 1,    "parent_id": 5,    "title": "Accusamus iste et ullam ratione voluptatem omnis debitis dolor est.",    "description": "Molestias dolorem eos vitae expedita impedit necessitatibus quo voluptatum.",    "author": {      "id": 10,      "name": "Lu Mayer",      "username": "kam",      "state": "active",      "avatar_url": "http://www.gravatar.com/avatar/018729e129a6f31c80a6327a30196823?s=80&d=identicon",      "web_url": "http://localhost:3001/kam"    },    "start_date": null,    "start_date_is_fixed": false,    "start_date_fixed": null,    "start_date_from_milestones": null,       //deprecated in favor of start_date_from_inherited_source    "start_date_from_inherited_source": null,    "end_date": "2018-07-31",                 //deprecated in favor of due_date    "due_date": "2018-07-31",    "due_date_is_fixed": false,    "due_date_fixed": null,    "due_date_from_milestones": "2018-07-31", //deprecated in favor of start_date_from_inherited_source    "due_date_from_inherited_source": "2018-07-31",    "created_at": "2018-07-17T13:36:22.770Z",    "updated_at": "2018-07-18T12:22:05.239Z",    "labels": []  }]

apis.name: Unassign a child epic
apis.description: Unassigns a child epic from a parent epic.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the group owned by the authenticated user.

attributes.name: epic_iid
attributes.description: The internal ID of the epic.

attributes.name: child_epic_id
attributes.description: The global ID of the child epic. Internal ID can’t be used because they can conflict with epics from other groups.
